knimeNode.name: Coordinate Panel
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create twp-dimensional data by manually adding them to a coordinate system and an image of coordinate system.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows the creation of a two dimensional data set by manually adding/clicking points to a coordinate system. With a Left-Click, points can be added and with a Right-Click points can be removed.
fullDescription.option: The minimum on the Y-Axis (must be less than or equal to zero)
The minimum on the X-Axis (must be less than or equal to zero)
The maximum on the Y-Axis (must be greater than zero)
The maximum on the X-Axis (must be greater than zero)
Determines the interval in which a grid line should be drawn on the Y-Axis
Determines the interval in which a grid line should be drawn on the X-Axis
If this option is activated, points will be added on the nearest intersection of the grid lines
Determines the class of the next point which will be added

ports.outPort: A PNG Image of the Coordinate Panel
